article_title: KEVIN FOLEY: Trump, public schools and Obamacare
article_text:
Marietta, GA (30060)

Today

Sun and clouds mixed. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High near 85F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 64F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Kevin Foley

og.description: Donald Trump’s amateurish ready-fire-aim campaign rolls on. Even as the billionaire blowhard wins the most votes, he manages to lose delegates.
